sentences.en: “No matter how he stuffs his readers with verbiage, it never amounts to a core of truth, ” he said.
sentences.cn: “不管他如何用废话喂饱他的读者，那些话都毫无真实可言，”他说。

sentences.en: Ethiopia rejected the verdict, and has since used diplomatic verbiage to obfuscate and stall.
sentences.cn: Ethiopia拒绝接受判决, 并通过外交冗节来模糊和拖延它.

sentences.en: Even in little 140-character bites, that's a lot of verbiage.
sentences.cn: 即使限制在一推140个字,也有很大一部分是废话。

sentences.en: Lots of verbiage about why your run - time bots won't work on the destination server.
sentences.cn: 关于 实时 运行组件无法在目的服务器工作的废话.

sentences.en: On his first visit to the US, and in his maiden address to the UN general assembly, Gaddafi fully lived up to his reputation for eccentricity, bloody-mindedness and extreme verbiage.
sentences.cn: 这是卡扎菲首次访问美国，也是他第一次在联大发表演讲；而他的表现也没有辜负他“性情古怪、诚心找茬、废话连篇”的名声。

sentences.en: Only by the economic investigation can the advertising writing not be just empty verbiage.
sentences.cn: 指出经济调查的成果决定广告写作水平.

sentences.en: Stripped of their pretentious verbiage, his statements come dangerously close to inviting racial hatred.
sentences.cn: 抛开那些夸大其词的冗词赘语不论，他的言论有挑起种族仇恨的危险。

sentences.en: The Verbiage of the Post – Dated Check is as per standard issuing Bank's Verbiage.
sentences.cn: 此远期支票保函按照开证行文本格式发行. 这么翻译不知是否正确?

sentences.en: Verily this vichyssoise of verbiage veers most verbose.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问我这拉拉杂杂的啰嗦最终变得冗长无比.

sentences.en: Verily, this Vichyssoise of Verbiage Veers most Verbose.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 我这罗嗦的拉拉杂杂最终变得冗长无比.

words.tran_cn: 咬文嚼字；冗词；言语表达；套话

trans.tran_en: speech or writing that has many unnecessary words in it
